tool_description: Reviews contract terms and legal provisions in RFP documents for compliance and risk assessment.
error_messages: Missing contract terms: Provide complete contract terms text.
Invalid liability limits: Liability limits must be positive numbers.
Incomplete IP provisions: Intellectual property clauses must be specified.
Missing termination clauses: Termination provisions are required.
Invalid dispute resolution: Specify valid dispute resolution method.
usage: Submit contract terms, liability limits, IP clauses, and termination provisions. Optionally specify dispute resolution preferences. The tool provides legal risk assessment and recommendations.

legal_risk_assessment.description: Overall legal risk level and analysis
